surepy.data.properties package¶

Submodules¶

  • surepy.data.properties.max_distance module
  • surepy.data.properties.statistics module

Module contents¶

This module provides functions that take locdata as input and compute a new property. The functions should return a dict with the property name as key and with the corresponding value.
